name: Inspector Schmidt: The Ebbing
summary: It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the North Sea coast.
